description: WebTPA, a third-party administrator that provides healthcare management and administrative services, disclosed a data breach. WebTPA is a third-party administrator that provides healthcare management and administrative services. The US company disclosed a data breach that impacted almost 2.5 million people. According to the report sent by the WebTPA to the U.S. Department of Health and […]
title: Healthcare firm WebTPA data breach impacted 2.5 million individuals

title: Security Affairs newsletter Round 472 by Pierluigi Paganini – INTERNATIONAL EDITION

description: Symantec warns of a new Linux backdoor used by the North Korea-linked Kimsuky APT in a recent campaign against organizations in South Korea.  Symantec researchers observed the North Korea-linked group Kimsuky using a new Linux backdoor dubbed Gomir. The malware is a version of the GoBear backdoor which was delivered in a recent campaign by […]
title: North Korea-linked Kimsuky used a new Linux backdoor in recent attacks
